name: Fire Mage
description: A powerful mage who wields the destructive power of fire magic. Masters of flame manipulation, Fire Mages can incinerate enemies with devastating spells while maintaining control over the battlefield through area-of-effect abilities.
abilities: Fire Affinity - Increased damage with fire spells
Heat Resistance - Reduced damage from fire attacks
Flame Mastery - Fire spells cost less mana
Pyromancer - Critical hits with fire spells have a chance to ignite enemies

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Launches a concentrated ball of fire at the target, dealing significant fire damage.

levels.2: Deals 140% magic damage, 10% chance to burn
levels.3: Deals 160% magic damage, 15% chance to burn
levels.4: Deals 180% magic damage, 20% chance to burn
levels.5: Deals 200% magic damage, 25% chance to burn

skills.name: Flame Burst
skills.description: Creates an explosion of fire around the caster, damaging all nearby enemies.

levels.1: Deals 100% magic damage to all enemies in range
levels.2: Deals 120% magic damage, pushes enemies back
levels.3: Deals 140% magic damage, pushes enemies back, 15% burn chance
levels.4: Deals 160% magic damage, pushes enemies back, 20% burn chance
levels.5: Deals 180% magic damage, pushes enemies back, 25% burn chance

skills.name: Inferno
skills.description: Summons a massive pillar of fire that deals continuous damage to enemies in its area.

levels.1: Deals 80% magic damage per second for 5 seconds
levels.2: Deals 100% magic damage per second for 6 seconds
levels.3: Deals 120% magic damage per second for 7 seconds
levels.4: Deals 140% magic damage per second for 8 seconds
levels.5: Deals 160% magic damage per second for 9 seconds

effects: Can be used to block passages

skills.name: Phoenix Rebirth
skills.description: The ultimate fire spell that transforms the caster into a phoenix, granting temporary invulnerability and massive fire damage.

levels.1: Transforms for 10 seconds, 200% magic damage, 50% damage reduction
levels.2: Transforms for 12 seconds, 250% magic damage, 60% damage reduction
levels.3: Transforms for 14 seconds, 300% magic damage, 70% damage reduction
levels.4: Transforms for 16 seconds, 350% magic damage, 80% damage reduction
levels.5: Transforms for 18 seconds, 400% magic damage, 90% damage reduction

talents.description: The Fire Mage talent tree focuses on increasing fire damage, reducing mana costs, and enhancing fire-based abilities.

1.name: Mana Efficiency
1.description: Reduces mana cost of fire spells by 5%

1.name: Heat Wave
1.description: Fire spells have a 5% chance to deal bonus damage

2.name: Pyromancer's Focus
2.description: Reduces cooldown of fire spells by 10%

2.name: Burning Touch
2.description: Melee attacks have a 15% chance to ignite enemies

3.name: Master of Flames
3.description: All fire spells gain additional effects

3.name: Phoenix Heart
3.description: Gain fire resistance and health regeneration when using fire spells

4.name: Infernal Mastery
4.description: Ultimate fire mastery - all fire abilities are significantly enhanced
effects: All fire spells can critically hit
